Report.SearchSQL: SELECT ci.[ContractID] ,ci.[ContractName] ,ci.[ContractTypeDefaultValue] as [ContractTYpe] ,ci.[VendorName] ,pod.[PurchaseOrderDetailID] ,po.[PurchaseOrderNo] ,pod.[SequenceNumber] as [POSequenceNumber] ,pod.[ItemDescription] as [POItemDescription] ,v.[VendorName] as [POVendorName] FROM dbo.[PurchaseOrderDetail_MT] as pod JOIN dbo.[ContractInfo] as ci on ci.[ContractID] = pod.ContractID JOIN dbo.[PurchaseOrder] as po on po.PurchaseOrderID = pod.PurchaseOrderID JOIN dbo.[Vendor] as v on v.VendorID = po.VendorID
